introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is とうひょう, which you will often hear in contexts related to elections, meetings, and decision-making. For example, you might hear this when discussing "casting a vote" or during a "vote count" when electing leaders or choosing options in meetings.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "とうひょう" means "vote" or "voting" in English. It's the action of making a choice or expressing an opinion at a meeting or an election.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 選挙 : せんきょ : election
採決 : さいけつ : vote
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms for the word "とうひょう" are "せんきょ" and "さいけつ." "せんきょ" refers to an election, implying a formal process where votes are cast to choose leaders. "さいけつ" is more about decision-making within organizations, indicating a vote to see which proposal or decision is favored.
antonyms: 無投票 : むとうひょう : without a vote
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word "とうひょう" are "きけん" and "むとうひょう." "きけん" means abstention, referring to the decision not to cast a vote. "むとうひょう" refers to cases where voting is not conducted, either because it's not needed or some agreement is reached without voting.

example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は明日(あした)投票(とうひょう)します。

translations.VI: Tôi sẽ bầu cử vào ngày mai.
translations.MY: မနက်ဖြန်အတွက်မဲပေးပါမည်။

example_sentences.furigana: 投票(とうひょう)結果(けっか)は面白(おもしろ)い。

translations.ES: Los resultados de la votación son interesantes.
translations.VI: Kết quả bầu cử thú vị.
translations.FR: Les résultats du vote sont intéressants.
translations.MY: မဲဆောက်မြို့လက်ထိုးစကားကစိတ်ဝင်စားစရာကောင်းပါတယ်။

example_sentences.kanji: ひみつ投票の時間です。
example_sentences.furigana: ひみつ(ひみつ)投票(とうひょう)の時間(じかん)です。

translations.EN: It's time for a secret vote.
translations.ID: Ini waktu untuk pemungutan suara rahasia.
translations.ES: Es hora de la votación secreta.
translations.VI: Đã đến lúc bỏ phiếu kín.
translations.TL: Oras na para sa lihim na pagboto.
translations.MY: လျှို့ဝှက် မဲဆန္ဒထုတ်ပေးရန် အချိန်ကျသွားပြီ။
translations.HI: यह गुप्त मतदान का समय है।

example_sentences.kanji: 投票所は駅のそばにあります。
example_sentences.furigana: 投票所(とうひょうじょ)は駅(えき)のそばにあります。

translations.EN: The polling station is near the station.
translations.ID: Tempat pemungutan suara berada di dekat stasiun.
translations.ES: La casilla de votación está cerca de la estación.
translations.VI: Phòng bỏ phiếu ở gần nhà ga.
translations.FR: Le bureau de vote est près de la gare.
translations.TL: Ang lugar ng botohan ay malapit sa istasyon.
translations.MY: မဲရုံဟာ ဘူတာရဲ့ အနားမှာ ရှိပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मतदान स्थल स्टेशन के पास है।
translations.FA: محل رأی‌گیری در نزدیکی ایستگاه است.
